billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Authorizes the Urban Development Corporation to create a subsidiary corporation for the oversight of the Atlantic Yards project
summary: Authorizes the Urban Development Corporation to create a subsidiary corporation for the purpose of the further planning, design, and oversight of the Atlantic Yards land use improvement and civic project.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1597

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  MONTGOMERY  -- read twice and ordered printed, and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Corporations, Author-
         ities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation  to  creating  a
         subsidiary  corporation for the planning and oversight of the Atlantic
         yards project

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Section 2827-a of the public authorities law is amended by
    2  adding a new subdivision 8 to read as follows:
    3    8. NOTWITHSTANDING SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS SECTION, THE URBAN DEVELOP-
    4  MENT CORPORATION IS HEREBY AUTHORIZED AND DIRECTED TO  IMMEDIATELY  TAKE
    5  ALL  ACTION  TO  CREATE  A  SUBSIDIARY  CORPORATION,  IN ACCORDANCE WITH
    6  SECTION TWELVE OF THE NEW YORK STATE URBAN DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION  ACT,
    7  FOR  THE  PURPOSE  OF  THE FURTHER PLANNING, DESIGN AND OVERSIGHT OF THE
    8  ATLANTIC YARDS LAND USE IMPROVEMENT AND CIVIC PROJECT.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately, provided that the subsid-
   10  iary corporation authorized in section one of this act must  be  created
   11  within 60 days of such authorization.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04682-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating a subsidiary corporation for the planning and oversight of the Atlantic yards project
